interface module¶

class interface.Interface(master)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to manage the GUI. Its methods take care of assembling the dynamics objects and solving the dynamics.

make_simulation(z_deploy_drogue, pos, outdy)[source]¶

This function performs a simulation of a rocket reentry using the provided parameters.

Parameters:

  • z_deploy_drogue – the altitude at which the drogue parachute is deployed.

  • pos – the position in the (eventual) array of altitudes, when iterating.

  • outdy – the output dynamics object.

run_button()[source]¶

This function is triggered when the “Run” button is clicked by the user. It performs the necessary validations on the input values and executes the simulation based on the selected options (i.e. it either iterates the dynamics or solves it only once).

show_iterate()[source]¶

This method is called when the user selects the iterate option. It shows or hides the input fields based on the selected option.
